query.queryString: select t.* from TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq=s.tour_seq where MATCH(t.name,t.hp,t.addr,t.photo,t.intro,t.area,t.theme,t.main_cat,t.sub_cat,t.note) AGAINST('해변' IN BOOLEAN MODE) limit 0,3
select * from TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq=s.tour_seq where MATCH(t.name,t.hp,t.addr,t.photo,t.intro,t.area,t.theme,t.main_cat,t.sub_cat,t.note) AGAINST('해변' IN BOOLEAN MODE) limit 0,3

SELECT * FROM TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq = s.tour_seq WHERE MATCH(t.name, t.hp, t.addr, t.photo, t.intro, t.area, t.theme, t.main_cat, t.sub_cat, t.note) AGAINST('해변' IN BOOLEAN MODE) LIMIT 0, 3
SELECT * FROM TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq = s.tour_seq WHERE MATCH(t.name, t.hp, t.addr, t.photo, t.intro, t.area, t.theme, t.main_cat, t.sub_cat, t.note) AGAINST('해변' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
SELECT * FROM TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq = s.tour_seq
SELECT * FROM TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq = s.tour_seq WHERE MATCH(name, hp, addr, photo, intro, area, theme, main_cat, sub_cat, note) AGAINST('해변' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
SELECT * FROM TourSpot t JOIN Statistics s ON t.seq = s.tour_seq WHERE MATCH(t.name, t.hp, t.addr, t.photo, t.intro, t.area, t.theme, t.main_cat, t.sub_cat, t.note) AGAINST('해수욕장' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
SELECT DEFAULT_COLLATION_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SCHEMATA WHERE SCHEMA_NAME = 'semi'
SELECT DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME, DEFAULT_COLLATION_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SCHEMATA WHERE SCHEMA_NAME = 'semi'
SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COLLATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'TourSpot'
SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COLLATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'GuestComment'
SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COLLATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'GuestReviewt'
SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COLLATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'GuestReview'
SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COLLATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'Statistics'
SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLLATION_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'semi' AND TABLE_NAME = 'TourSpot'
